TopicTitle: Simple divide Jet fuel RCS and fuel tanks into categories please

Articles.Content: I for one am annoyed at scrolling through liquid fuel tanks + engines, jet fuel + engines and RCS... please do a little change and move RCS fuel tanks into control category and Jet engines and fuel into their own separate category along with the aerodynamics parts. It also might be an idea to have an electronics category for batteries, comms, solar panels etc and then a separate category for parachutes, ladders, landing legs? It just would feel more intuitive this way.
With the 0.90 update, you can make your own categories if you want to. It even has pictures you can put on!
That seems like shrugging the blame off of a bad feature by allowing you to customise it. I'm not particularly interested in a game that is bad, but is good after you customise the hell out of it.

I'd definitely support moving the RCS tanks into the control tab... It's not like the control tab is overflowing with all what, five parts it contains? Six?

I could also go for a stock electric category too.

The customization is nice, but I'm not sure if it carries over between games (and most assuredly does not between installs), and the configuration may break on an update.
